alert.note: Alert for Eastern Orleans; Southeast St. Tammany; Southwestern St. Tammany (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued November 08 at 2:11PM CST until November 09 at 10:00AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 10 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. Smoke from local fires can reduce visibility to less than 100 feet across small portions of the advised area especially between I-510 and Irish Bayou. * WHERE...Southeast St. Tammany, Eastern Orleans and Southwestern St. Tammany Parishes. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 10 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Smoke mixing with fog can create very dangerous driving conditions. Plan extra time for your morning commute through this area and be prepared for sudden changes in both visibility and traffic conditions.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your low beam headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you, and consider waiting until visibility improves to travel if possible. Check your headlight settings to ensure they stay on during daylight hours in case you encounter dense fog.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Orleans; Southeast St. Tammany; Southwestern St. Tammany
